title: Now accepting applications for Twilio Fund
content: Last week, we announced the Twilio Fund for 500 Startups, a $250K platform micro-fund for investments in Twilio-powered startups.Â We're now accepting applications at 500startups.com/twiliofund. All terms are the same for the Twilio Fund, except we've done away with the timeline. That means there won't be any deadline for submissions, and we'll be reviewing submissions as they come in via the form. We do encourage you to submit as early as you can - the sooner the better. Looking forward to seeing what you got!
